      addCategory(): Adds new entries to the database tables.
      Parameters:

    • addConcept

      public void addConcept(Concept concept)
      addConcept(): Adds new entries to the database tables.
      Parameters:
      concept - The concept to add. It must be linked to an existing category.

    • updateCategory

      public boolean updateCategory(int categoryId, String newTopic)
      updateCategory(): Updates existing components to the database tables.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to update.
      newTopic - The new topic to set for the category.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • updateConcept

      public boolean updateConcept(int conceptId, String newTopic, String newDetails)
      updateConcept(): Updates existing categories to the database tables.
      Parameters:
      conceptId - The ID of the concept to update.
      newTopic - The new topic for the concept.
      newDetails - The new details to set for the concept.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • updateComponent

      public boolean updateComponent(int conceptId, String oldTopic, String newTopic, String newDetails)
      updateComponent(): Updates existing concepts to the database tables.
      Parameters:
      conceptId - The ID of the concept to which the component belongs.
      oldTopic - The current topic of the component.
      newTopic - The new topic to set for the component.
      newDetails - The new details to set for the component.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

      public boolean deleteCategory(int categoryId)
      deleteCategory(): Removes category from the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - Removes the category from the database by id

      public boolean deleteConcept(int conceptId)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.

      public boolean deleteComponent(String componentTopic)

      Parameters:
      componentTopic - The topic of the component to delete.
